column2: A warrior cannot afford to grow idle, in the comfort of their home! Spreading one's name, as well as domain, is a clear path to glory.
I must show my devotion to the [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], if I wish for him to favor me in battle. The greater my sacrifice the greater will be the reward that the Papa Nurgle Will Give.

I must show my devotion to the ruinous patron of my warband if I wish for them to favor me in battle. The greater my sacrifice the greater will be the reward that the ruinous powers will grant me in the wars to come.
I must show my devotion to my order if I wish for them to assist me in battle. The greater my sacrifice the greater will be the reward that the order will grant me in the wars to come.
I shall let loose a disease to even bewilder the great Nurgle!.
I shall let loose a disease to even please the great Nurgle!.
Only the boldest of experiments shall be rewarded by Nurgle!.
I will give the greatest gift of Nurgle to my own flesh and blood to please Papa Nurgle!
I will sacrifice my most beloved family member to please tzeentch!
I shall Duel one of my best commanders to a duel to please Khorne!
This option is available because you are a member of §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!.
This option is available because you are a member of §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!.
Is NOT currently choosing a Chaos Aspect
Releases Deadly disease in settlement, §ZCausing Prosperity Drop!§!
